subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Michael Waltrip Racing has hired three new crew chiefs, including Ryan Pemberton, who left Dale Earnhardt Inc. earlier this week. Pemberton will be the crew chief for David Reutimann. Waltrip had a rough first season as a team owner, with his three cars struggling to make races.
